dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Check thte Status of the EMR Hadoop cluster.

States include one of the following: COMPLETED, FAILED, TERMINATED, RUNNING, SHUTTING_DOWN, STARTING and WAITING

RUNNING indicates that the cluster is executing a job.

Waiting indicates the cluster is idle and is not working on any jobs.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Please refer to Marwa Mabrouk: mmabrouk@esri.com for questions and feedback.

Consts.useLimit: Using this tool with Amazon Web Services requires an Amazon Web Services account, costs will be incurred to that account per the usage of this tool with it.

tool.name: EMRStatus

param.name: jobid
param.dialogReference:
The ID of the EMR Job Flow created using the EMR Setup tool. This unique identifier is used to refer to the cluster.

In case of many clusters running at the same time, the jobid can be used to select which cluster will execute which job.

param.name: awskey
param.dialogReference:
AWS Key.

Please refer to http://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/getting-aws-sec-creds.html

you will find it under Access keys (access key ID and secret access key)

param.name: awssecretkey
param.dialogReference:
AWS Secret Key.

Please refer to http://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/getting-aws-sec-creds.html

you will find it under Access keys (access key ID and secret access key)

param.name: region
param.expression: us-east-1 | us-west-1 | us-west-2 | eu-west-1 | ap-southeast-1 | ap-southeast-2 | ap-northeast-1 | sa-east-1
param.dialogReference:
Which AWS Region to use. For example:

Virginia is us-east-1

Oregon is us-west-2

For more information please refer to: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-regions-availability-zones.html

tool.summary:
Check thte Status of the EMR Hadoop cluster.

States include one of the following: COMPLETED, FAILED, TERMINATED, RUNNING, SHUTTING_DOWN, STARTING and WAITING

RUNNING indicates that the cluster is executing a job.

Waiting indicates the cluster is idle and is not working on any jobs.
tool.usage: To determine what is the status of the EMR Hadoop cluster.
